import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Footer}from'../../../Footer/Footer';import{Header}from'../../../Header/Header';import'./AdminUserCreate.css';import{AdapterDayjs}from'@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDayjs';import{LocalizationProvider}from'@mui/x-date-pickers/LocalizationProvider';import{DatePicker}from'@mui/x-date-pickers/DatePicker';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function AdminUserCreate(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[date,setDate]=useState(null);const updateClick=event=>{event.preventDefault();const form=event.currentTarget;const formData=new FormData(form);const formDataObject={};formData.forEach((value,key)=>{formDataObject[key]=value;});// Преобразуем дату из Dayjs объекта в ISO строку
formDataObject['RegistrationDate']=date?date.toISOString():null;fetch(form.action,{method:form.method,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(formDataObject)}).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{navigate('/');console.log('Success:',data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error:',error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{text:['Ктс-Создание (пользователь)']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:updateClick,className:"create-block-form",method:"post",action:"https://localhost:8080/api/users",encType:"application/json",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create-block-data form-control",type:"text",name:"Name",placeholder:"\u0418\u043C\u044F"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create-block-data form-control",type:"text",name:"Email",placeholder:"Email"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create-block-data form-control",type:"number",name:"Age",placeholder:"Age",step:1,min:1,max:100,id:"age"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LocalizationProvider,{dateAdapter:AdapterDayjs,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DatePicker,{label:"\u0414\u0430\u0442\u0430 \u0440\u0435\u0433\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438",slotProps:{textField:{helperText:'MM/DD/YYYY',name:'RegistrationDate'}},value:date,onChange:newValue=>setDate(newValue)})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create-button",type:"submit",value:"Create"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}
